div.div:
Annessa - June 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 0.29
Galaxy note lte
Add handcent support without having to enable accesibility!!!!!

Angelos - June 16, 2012 - Version 0.29
Extra useful so I bought it
Thanks dev, just bought the donate version keep it up! One of the most useful app as I don't hear my messages from the first time

Gary - May 19, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Ace with version 0.29
Superb
Works flawlessly with my Galaxy Ace Plus, now i never miss my messages and emails. Spot on thank you.

Anthony - June 7, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 0.29
Very good
All future phones should have this. Very good.

Tony - May 8, 2012 - Samsung Exhibit 2 4G with version 0.29
Works great. No issues.

D-ZAM - May 8, 2012 - Version 0.28
Haven't missed a txt message yet!!
This does one thing very well, it lets you know you missed a message. Something so simple yet it had to have a 3rd party app written to do it. I miss so many message from my wife or missed phone calls for work. Not anymore. Thank you for writing this app. Well worth the paid version to get the sleep timer for night time.

John - April 12, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 0.28
Brilliant on HTC Desire HD
Its always been difficult to find a phone that flashes the screen for me. This program does exactly that. I am extremely deaf and never hear the phone go off - voice calls are immediately cut off but I missed a lot of SMS messages. Not any more. Once I have worked out the timing on the system it will be good but has already paid for itself. I have received several SMS and because of the screen flasing, never missed one. I am so pleased I found this and the cost is pretty good too. Its a shame its only 5 stars - I would have liked to give it 10!!!

pirateaye - February 6, 2012 - Motorola Photon 4G with version 0.28
Suggestions
No easy way for feedback. Need more options for interval checks. Should specify time offset from the hour for those with two phones to have staggered checks and save battery. ie 5:00 pm + 5, and + 10, both check every 15 min

Martin - March 6, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Ace with version 0.28
Not sure.
Not sure but its either this app or my call anouncer or both that keeps changing my fone volume. Im still gona use it though.

angel - April 8, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 0.28
Very cool
Works great with my sprint Samsung epic 4g 1st Gen

Larrry404 - April 6, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S with version 0.28
Great!
Was looking for one that works! Thanks!

Jason - November 27, 2011 - HTC myTouch 4G with version 0.27
Very useful!
Great app for the deaf and hearing impaired too! Also helps knowing if you have a text/notification when you leave the phone sitting across the room!

david - December 28, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 0.27
Brilliant
Took a while to set up, I did not realise at first, when testing, that it only works when screen is in stand by. All works just fine now never miss anything anymore, will also notifiy you of any app notification as well, great app well worth the small fee. Galaxy S2

Cosmin - January 10, 2012 - Version 0.27
Finally, one that WORKS!
I've been trying every notification-bar-reminder-app. in the market and most have bugs and/or other bothering issues - so far this one works flawlessly. Highly recommended!

Catbells - November 20, 2011 - HTC Wildfire with version 0.27
Tiny and effective
Gets me out of the house on time. Love the new feature of working with any app. Now it insists on me doing my tasks. HTC Wildfire.

Josh - January 17, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 0.27
Works Well
Works great and reminds you of missed notifications. It would be nice to see a way to select which Gmail inboxes to notify on... I have 1 personal and 2 work gmail accounts. I would rather just be alerted to missed work emails throughout the day. Other than that... great app.

pdxgeekin - December 14, 2011 - Version 0.27
Not bad, but some rough spots
This app does what is says is does for the most part. For missed email it would be nice if you could select which email account in your gmail or K-9 apps that you would like to be notified for. Also, I noticed the on the Droid X2 MMF does not seem to work for the native mail app. I monitor separate personal and work email accounts that use the same email app. I like the Sleep Schedule option and the multiple different ways that you can be reminded (eg. flashing screen, vibrate on intervals, and good ol' audible alarms). Keep up the good work.

Toes_NZ - December 6, 2011 - Version 0.27
Excellent app
I use this for text messages only. Works exceptionally well.

Nick - December 14, 2011 - HTC EVO Shift 4G with version 0.27
Needs ability to choose diferent ringtone for each app. Ie: voice mail, email, ...
Needs ability to choose diferent ringtone for each app. Ie: voice mail, email, text, missed call, etc. Please add option!!!!!!!!!!

Laughing Deer, 鹿仔 - December 24, 2011 - SEMC Xperia Mini Pro with version 0.27
The best
Best missed calls/messages apps! Works well! Sony Xeperia pro

VPhantom - February 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 0.27
Finally!
Someone clever got it right! :) Hard to believe Android is at v4 and still can't repeat alerts like my old pager already could back in 1996... Thank you!

imf - July 14, 2011 - Galaxy Prevail with version 0.26
Works great with Samsung Galaxy Prevail
Does it exactly what it says and does it well. I was really annoyed that the Prevail doesn't have any kind of LED to indicate when you have missed a call or message, and this app fixed that. I had to mess with it a little to get it working, but it works great now. I think I fixed it by changing the screen flash method to Alternate 1. Thanks for this great app! I love that you can choose what type of notifications cause it to flash. No need to be constantly bugged by facebook updates or other minutiae.

Omar - October 20, 2011 - Motorola Photon 4G with version 0.26
The App that I've been searching for!!!!!
Love it. Would suggest more granular controls. Specify alert tones per email account. The option to exclude accounts.

carolinep - July 17, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 0.26
Works great but odd timings sometimes
I use the sound alerts since I miss screen flashes as well as calls! And it works very well indeed, except that even though I've lengthened the times between beeps it doesn't seem to pay much attention to that for the first two reminders. But it's a small irritiation. Now if only it worked with ProSMS, I'd be really happy!

Raffi - November 1, 2011 - Version 0.26
Does the job but can use at least one upgrade...
Been using this app for a few months now and relatively happy with it. Very useful and reliable! But, I would really like to see an option where I can set the notification to not come on WHILE I AM ON A CALL. Nothing more annoying than being on a call while the phone is vibrating and "ringing", because someone called me/left a message while I am on the call.

Buster - October 18, 2011 - Samsung Droid Charge with version 0.26
Great
One i would defiantly miss

bt - October 9, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 0.25
works great samsung galaxy s2
Very useful app! Five stars for separate gmail accounts and specifying of alerting of SMS from specific number.

SimbaK2K - September 20, 2011 - Version 0.23
Just the app for the job
I had a problem with not receiving alerts for whatsapp messages when on silent with my Samsung Galaxy S2 and this solves the problem perfectly. Works well and recommended. Also supports many other apps.

Tierix - July 24, 2011 - Version 0.22
Great app but...
Hi, fantastic job with this app! TIP for all of you: You can even change the vibrating intensity in this app by using the Haptick Feedback in SETTINGS-SOUNDS of your phone (at least for the Samsung GS2). Once the Haptick Feedback is enabled, you can change the vibrating intensity just below, it will also change the intensity in the app.

Danzino - August 23, 2011 - Dell Streak with version 0.22
Missed Messenger
Excellent application

Dean - September 11, 2011 - Droid Bionic with version 0.22
Droid Bionic
Because I work in a loud environment, most often I don't hear the phone. This app is a must have. Works great on my Droid Bionic.

Todd - August 2, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 0.21
Great.
I had a small issue with the free version which was quickly fixed by the developer. This app comes in handy every day.

Jules - August 11, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 0.21
Bye bye Blackberry
MMF solves the one issue I had about moving to an android device - the lack of repetitive and visual notification. Works well on Nexus S. Thanks!

Bernie - July 18, 2011 - HTC Wildfire with version 0.20
works like it says
used the free version to check it work on HTC Wildfire. Does exactly what I was wanting it to. So got the donate version so I can turn off during the sleeping hours. Great App.

Asriel - July 28, 2011 - Motorola Defy with version 0.20
This app covers the one feature my phone lacks over my old one, a ...
This app covers the one feature my phone lacks over my old one, a repeating notification. Thanks. Works perfect on Froyo Defy.

Brenton - July 28, 2011 - LG Optimus One with version 0.20
Great job. Set the time as low as possible on Optimus one and buttons ...
Great job. Set the time as low as possible on Optimus one and buttons flash but screen stays off.

Jaspersplace - July 14, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 0.18
.
Doesn't work, sgs ii

Tim - December 3, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 0.17
Great app, could just do with some personal options in the timer section, I.e. ...
Great app, could just do with some personal options in the timer section, I.e. set own timings & needs day management on the sleep scheduler :)

Rick - June 8, 2011 - Motorola Droid with version 0.17
Perfect

Ken - May 18, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 0.15
Excellent EVO 4g!

ajai - May 20, 2011 - Version 0.15
Doesn't work at all with Galaxy S. Tried all settings

staffsmatt - March 8, 2011 - HTC Legend with version 0.09
Great little app, really useful and very responsive dev.

George - March 1, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 0.08
THIS COOL APP JUST KEEPS GETTING BETTER, THANKS.

Philip Murphy - February 28, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 0.08
Perfect App.

Donald - February 10, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 0.07
Could be really awesome. Only works for the first incoming message then doesn't ...
Could be really awesome. Only works for the first incoming message then doesn't work. T-Mobile Vibrant(Galaxy S).

Um Ibrahim wa Isa - December 15, 2010 - Transform(M920) with version 0.06
Cool idea for those of us w/o LED lights but it didn't work for ...
Cool idea for those of us w/o LED lights but it didn't work for me on missed calls. Should add the option to vibrate or make a tone. Samsung Transform

Elizabeth - December 2, 2010 - Version 0.06
Wonderful if u have no led indicator on your phone

Sean - January 3, 2011 - Version 0.06
Crashes on my sgs with no lagfix

Demetrius - June 30, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note
Missed Massage Flasher Donate
I like it! It's good enough for me!
